=Overview =

Tmix for Full-TCP has been included in the standard codebase of ns-2 since [http://sourceforge.net/projects/nsnam/files/allinone/ns-allinone-2.34/ ns-2.34] (June 2009).

Tmix for one-way TCP has been included since 
[http://sourceforge.net/projects/nsnam/files/allinone/ns-allinone-2.35/ ns-2.35] (Nov 2011).

Documentation - [http://nsnam.isi.edu/nsnam/index.php/Manual:_Tmix:_Internet_Traffic_Generation Tmix in ns-2 Manual]

= Examples =

Links are to the [http://nsnam.cvs.sourceforge.net/viewvc/nsnam/ns-2/tcl/ex/tmix/ tcl/ex/tmix/ directory of ns-2.35]:
 * [http://nsnam.cvs.sourceforge.net/viewvc/nsnam/ns-2/tcl/ex/tmix/sample-orig.cvec?revision=1.1&view=markup sample-orig.cvec ] - sample connection vector file, original format
 * [http://nsnam.cvs.sourceforge.net/viewvc/nsnam/ns-2/tcl/ex/tmix/sample-alt.cvec?revision=1.1&view=markup sample-alt.cvec ] - sample connection vector file, alternate format
 * [http://nsnam.cvs.sourceforge.net/viewvc/nsnam/ns-2/tcl/ex/tmix/test-tmix.tcl?revision=1.2&view=markup test-tmix.tcl ] - Full-TCP example, generates tmix-trace.trq.gz
 * [http://nsnam.cvs.sourceforge.net/viewvc/nsnam/ns-2/tcl/ex/tmix/test-tmix-oneway.tcl?revision=1.2&view=markup test-tmix-oneway.tcl ] - one-way TCP example, generates tmix-oneway-trace.trq.gz

Generated output files:
 * [http://code.google.com/p/tmix-ns2/downloads/detail?name=tmix-trace.trq tmix-trace.trq] - 21 MB, generated by test-tmix.tcl
 * [http://code.google.com/p/tmix-ns2/downloads/detail?name=tmix-oneway-trace.trq tmix-trace-oneway.trq] - 30 MB, generated by test-tmix-oneway.tcl
